content:
In 9 settlements of Zaporizhzhya region, the enemy struck 418 beats per day.

About thisinformsThe head of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov in his telegram channel, reports the Armyinform.

As a result of the enemy shelling of the Pologovsky district, a 54-year-old man was wounded.

The enemy has struck four aviation strikes by Russian servicemen in Gulyaypol, Small Tokmachka, Malinovtsi and Robot.

95 UAV attacked Zaporozhye, Guliaypole, Levadne, robot, small Tokmachka, Malynivka, Novoandriivka and Novoyakovlivka.

15 RSSV-supports came across Guliaypol, Orikhov, Small Tokmachka, Robovin and Malinovtsi.

304 Artudari was inflicted on the territory of Guliaypol, Small Tokmachka, Robot, Novoandriivka, Malynivka and Levadny.

Earlier the Armyinformreportedthat the enemy is most attacked in the Novopavlovsky and Avdeevsky directions.
title: The occupiers have inflicted 418 strokes in the Zaporozhye region during the day: there is a wounded
description: The head of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov informs about it in his telegram-channel, reports ...
author: Army Inform
